change_language_title:
Chon ngon ngu ban muon su dung
va nhan nut xac nhan de hoan thanh
change_theme_title:
Chon che do mau ban muon su dung
va nhan nut xac nhan de hoan thanh
login_subtitle: Truy cap bang dieu khien de quan ly ho so chung chi de dang.
login_helper: Su dung tai khoan quan tri de xem va duyet yeu cau chung chi.
login_side_heading: He thong quan ly chung chi hien dai
login_side_description: Theo doi ho so, phe duyet chung chi va cap nhat theo thoi gian thuc cho cac nhom.
login_highlight_caption: Tu dong hoa kiem chung va giam 40% thoi gian xu ly.
register_org_hero_title: Dang ky to chuc de nhan chung chi tin cay
register_org_hero_subtitle: Chia se thong tin don vi, chung toi se cau hinh giai phap phu hop.
register_org_section_reason_title: Ly do to chuc lua chon CertifyChain
register_org_section_reason_desc: Tu phat hanh den xac thuc tuc thi, chung toi ho tro cac doi tac dao tao trien khai nhanh.
register_org_highlight_security_desc: Chung chi duoc neo blockchain, kho bi sua doi va theo doi day du.
register_org_highlight_onboarding_desc: Ho tro API va dashboard ket noi voi cac phong ban.
register_org_highlight_verification_desc: Doanh nghiep va doi tac nhan ket qua chi trong vai giay.
register_org_contact_prefer_text: Can tu van nhanh? Lien he bo phan quan he doi tac:
register_org_contact_response_time: Chung toi phan hoi trong 1 ngay lam viec.
register_org_form_description: Vui long dien thong tin ben duoi de chung toi chuan bi goi hop tac.
register_org_form_success: Da nhan dang ky, chung toi se lien he trong thoi gian som nhat.
register_org_form_error_default: Khong the gui form dang ky.
register_org_personal_info_description: Cho biet nguoi phu trach chinh de chung toi ho tro kip thoi.
register_org_organization_info_descripti: Chia se chi tiet de chung toi de xuat giai phap phu hop.
register_org_programs_placeholder: Mo ta cac chung chi hoac chuong trinh dang phat hanh.
register_org_form_disclaimer: Bang cach gui form, ban dong y nhan thong tin ho tro tu CertifyChain.
register_org_wallet_no_account: Khong co tai khoan nao duoc cap quyen
register_org_wallet_unavailable: MetaMask khong san sang tren trinh duyet nay
register_org_wallet_step_description: Ket noi vi cua to chuc de hoan tat dang ky.
register_org_wallet_required: Vui long ket noi vi cua to chuc.
register_org_wallet_invalid: Dia chi vi khong hop le.
